data.message: Hi someone logged into my facebook and changed my name to Josh Campbell, My name is Michael Shaffer not Josh, and now its saying it won't let me change it back. What can I do?

replies.message: Hi Michael. If someone logged into your account without your permission, please secure it here: on.fb.me/XqYbih. We can also take you through a few steps to make sure any recent changes to your account were made by you as well as help you change your password and secure your account. To get started, visit: http://bit.ly/2j58HbR. -Kiara
Can you respond to my private message Facebook
No they seem to ignore every private medsage sent
Why it is not possible with FB to solve a problem. Why there is no support. Why nobody answers the questions sent by FB.
hello someone accepted to those people who added me that i dont know Facebook

Facebook Facebook My ticker has not worked for several weeks now. There is no arrow in the upper right hand corner of my home page to unhide the ticker. The ticker area is covered up by the chat screen. What do I do?

We're sorry to hear that, Michael. If someone else has logged into your account without your permission, please secure it here: on.fb.me/XqYbih. We can also help you make sure recent changes to your account were made by you: http://bit.ly/2AvYIHf. -Anna
